title: Writing: the new. Part 3
creator_credit: Country Education Project, Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education, Daryl Wayland and David Zweck
brief_description: The new general writing section of HSC English distinguishes between argumentative and imaginative writing tasks and creatice writing. This program explores comments on these tasks and provides some guidence for their management. Presented by Peter Couchman.
